name: Bones (scruffyowl)
description:
Neighbors claim the old mansion is haunted, so you go exploring. You do find a friendly, if somewhat skinny fellow in the attic.  He's happy enough to meet you, but, honestly, a bit of a mess.

Fortunately, with your excellent knowledge of human anatomy, you can help him out.

This tiny game sprouted from a 3D model of a human skeleton I've been working on for fun.

Credits

Snippets of Monkey Island Music: Original Score by Michael Land
